title: AIM-OS Architecture Overview
summary: Structured brief describing the five core invariants and their interactions.

sections.heading: Context Memory Core (CMC)
sections.body: CMC captures every observation with reversible snapshots and bitemporal lineage.

sections.heading: Shared Evidence Graph (SEG)
sections.body: SEG reconciles decisions, detects contradictions, and anchors provenance for audits.
bullets: Records decision conflicts with auto-resolution guidance
Aligns with VIF for governance checks

sections.heading: Policy-Aware Blast Radius
sections.body: Preventive guardrails simulate change impacts before execution, enforcing policy packs.
